name: Panoptia
description:
In a small peaceful town, there is a mysterious building called Panoptia by the townsfolk. No one knows what it is for, but it is heavily protected for some unknown reason. But when a girl gets past the security, she finds herself in an ever-expanding subterranean world, where thoughts and desires, both good and bad, come to life.


Panoptia is a narrative-driven adventure and features a rich world with a variety of environments to explore. Explore areas such as the subway, offices, or mall to discover the mystery behind the creation of this strange building.


  • A haunting, ambient original soundtrack
  • A story-rich world
  • Choices that affect the player and story


This game was wholly made by me, Enrico. I've done all the programming, music, art, and writing, so I hope you can support me in any way you can! Whether it be buying the game, recommending it, or just adding to your Steam Wishlist, anything helps! I've been working on it for the past two years and this game means so much to me. Making this game and its world and characters is a true passion of mine and I hope you enjoy!
